text: Stalling Busk is one of three settlements around Semer Water in the Richmondshire district of North Yorkshire in the small dale of Raydale just off from Wensleydale, England. The hamlet lies to the immediate south of the lake. St Matthew's Church, Stalling Busk As well as the Grade II listed St Matthew's church, Stalling Busk has a second church which can be found on a short walk towards Semer Water. ==References== ==External links== Category:Villages in North Yorkshire Category:Wensleydale
title: Stalling Busk
